document_data.name: Angath
document_data.mainbody: '''Angath''' was an [[Warlock Knights#Ranks|Executor]] with the [[Warlock Knights]] of [[Vaasa]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Tyranny's Bleak Depths|32}}
document_data.Description: As a Knight-Executor, Angath was the equivalent of a landless nobleman. He was understood to serve Warlock Knights above himself in their hierarchy.
document_data.Personality: His enemies considered him to be a fool.
document_data.Relationships: Angath had an adversarial relationship with Knight-Fellthane [[Vorlanth]], and was known or suspected to meddle in his affairs. As of the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Vorlanth had warned Angath to stay away from his business dealings.
